title: What role does music play in your day to day life? - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Music always fascinated me from when I was a little kid and still does to this day. Working as a composer/sound designer for games I feel blessed every day that I can be in touch with this mystic world that touches every soul that can hear and feel. It’s an endless ocean of potential and emotions that breathes life. Music saved me loads of times in the most low situations for me so far and I think will be my salvation to the very end. I am very grateful that I can pay my bills doing what I really love and at the same time be involved within this powerful force.

I live it, breathe it, eat it and sleep it. I am a professional musician and music teacher. I write music, I arrange music, I write articles about music, I post lessons about music online, I talk about music in Quora and on Facebook. Music is just about always the first thing I think about when I wake up and the last thing I think about when I lay my head down for the night. I dream about music, performing, even creating songs in my sleep. If you talk with me for more than five minutes, I’ll invariably mention something about music. So, it is a bit important to me.
